modName: Malukah The Dragonborn song mod for Tavern music
summary: Tavern background music replaced with The Dragonborn Comes song from Malukah
descriptionHtml:
Tavern background music replaced with \"The Dragonborn Comes\" song from Malukah

Install: unrar  (expand .rar archiv) & copy Data folder in to Skyrim folder

If exist Data folder, then copy Music folder in Skyrim/Data folder

They enter a tavern to hear the song

Enjoy :-)

Thanks to Malukah for song: www.youtube.com/watch?v=4z9TdDCWN7g

Thanks to user Pile_glodje_kost for idea ^^

Changelog version 1.0 -> 2.0 = new Sound file from Malukah Soundcloud website:

http://soundcloud.com/malukah/the-dragonborn-comes-skyrim

Credits: Bethesda, Jeremy Soule
author: Xardas011

files.name: The Dragonborn Comes song from Malukah
